title: World’s Easiest Noodle Soup
summary: World’s Easiest Noodle Soup might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe makes 4 servings with 893 calories, 27g of protein, and 40g of fat each. For $5.43 per serving, this recipe covers 30% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. It will be a hit at your Autumn event. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 10 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a dairy free diet. Head to the store and pick up soy sauce or, oyster sauce or, coins ginger, and a few other things to make it today. With a spoonacular score of 76%, this dish is good. Try World's Best Chicken Noodle Soup, The Best, Easiest, Quickest Chicken Noodle Soup Ever, and World's Easiest Chili for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: No one wine will suit every pasta dish. Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a montepulciano or chianti. Pasta with seafood or pesto will fare better with a light-bodied white, such as a pinot grigio. Cheese-heavy pasta can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses. We may be able to make a better recommendation if you ask again with a specific pasta dish.
